title: Kevin Hart Interview
itunes:title: Kevin Hart Interview
description:
Today on the show we had friend to the room Kevin Hart stop by where he spokea about he blueprint of the Black Business Mogul, cancel culture and new Series ‘True Story. Moreover we falshed back to when the queen Mary J. Blige stopped by and spoke on her music, growth and more. Also, we flashed back to when Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to a hospital clinic for doing the wrong surgery on a patient. And stayed tuned to listen to Berner stopping by and speaking about the Marijuana Industry, Educating People Through The 'Couch Locked Network' and more.
